short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fast and user-friendly Chrome extension to export your ChatGPT conversations in multiple formats or import large files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fast and user-friendly Chrome extension to export your ChatGPT conversations in multiple formats or import large files for processing in ChatGPT.

## Features

- **Export Formats**: Choose from HTML and PDF to save your conversations.
- **File Import**: Upload large files (TXT, DOCX, PDF) to ChatGPT and get responses quickly.
- **Custom File Names**: Automatically names exported files using the first user message.
- **Google Business Feedback**: Easily leave feedback on our Google Business profile.
- **Multiple Export Formats**: Export your chats in various formats such as HTML, PDF.
- **User Feedback**: Easily leave feedback on our Google Business Profile to help us improve and enhance the extension further.
- **Performance Optimized**: Export large conversations quickly and efficiently without compromising performance.
- **Metadata in Exports**: Add useful details such as timestamps and user information to your exported files.
